:::Wheeljack/Banzai-Tron:::

Wheeljack: it shall be done Zardus.
::He walks out of the base and heads for the old base.  While he is walking 
toward the site of contruction, he opens up his comm to the Lavacons::
Wheeljack: Lavacons? This is Wheeljack, Zardus told me and Composer to build 
a repair/recharge station and said you guys will help us. Could you come to 
our postion?
~~~~~
::Banzai-Tron dodged the twister but was hit by some of the wind, blowing him 
back a few feet. He recovers and fires 25 rapid fire eyebeams from each optic 
at Tigerhawk::

--part1_b8.12798297.27d96aa0_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
